dedicatedCloud_options_security_modal_ti: Enable healthcare data hosting and HDS certification
dedicatedCloud_options_pcidss: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)
dedicatedCloud_options_hds: Healthcare data hosting and HDS certification
dedicatedCloud_options_hipaa: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)
dedicatedCloud_options_security_info: You can only activate one option.
dedicatedCloud_options_security_title_to:
The following rules apply for security options (PCI DSS, HDS and HIPAA):
  • Only one option can be activated
  • The NSX and vROps options must be activated.
  • The Hosted Private Cloud must have at least one authorised IP address, and restricted access.
  • The administrator must have a mobile number, an email address, and they must also be the token validator.
dedicatedCloud_options_security_step1_in: The NSX and vROps options must be activated on your infrastructure:
dedicatedCloud_options_security_step2_in: Your infrastructure must have restricted access and at least one authorised IP address.
dedicatedCloud_options_security_step3_in: At least your "admin" user must have a mobile phone number and email address, and they must be the "token validator".
dedicatedCloud_options_security_step3_li: Users who can validate tokens by SMS:
dedicatedCloud_options_trusted_ip_checkl: IPs and blocks authorised to connect:
